stalwart_update_account.description:
Update account settings. Change password, quota, description, add emails.

    Partial updates supported - only provided fields are changed.
    Use add_emails to add alias addresses without removing existing ones.

    Args:
        params: UpdateAccountInput containing:
            - account_name: Account to update (required)
            - description: New display name (optional)
            - password: New password (optional)
            - quota: New quota in bytes (optional)
            - add_emails: Additional email aliases (optional)

    Returns:
        Confirmation that account was updated.
